metadata.title: CVE-2017-9103 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in adns before 1.5.2. pap_mailbox822 does notproperly check st from adns__findlabel_next. Without this, an uninitialisedstack value can be used as the first label length. Depending on thecircumstances, an attacker might be able to trick adns into crashing thecalling program, leaking aspects of the contents of some of its memory,causing it to allocate lots of memory, or perhaps overrunning a buffer.This is only possible with applications which make non-raw queries for SOAor RP records.

criterions.comment: adns package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
